heroSection.title: How can we help you?
heroSection.subTitle: Search our knowledge base or get in touch with our support team

SupportFAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions

trackOrder.q: How can I track my order?
trackOrder.a: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'Orders' section. Click on the order you want to track to view real-time updates.

returnPolicy.a: We offer a return policy upon receipt of the order for most products. Products must be unused and in their original packaging. Products are mostly returned in cases of breakage or damage, and the amount is refunded to the customer if prepaid.

shippingTime.a: Standard shipping takes 1 to 5 business days. International orders usually arrive within 7-14 days.

paymentMethods.q: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.a: Cash on Delivery. Other payment methods will be available soon via CliQ, major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Amex), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All transactions are secure and encrypted.

updateAccount.q: How do I change my account information?
updateAccount.a: Log in to your account and navigate to 'Account Information'.

internationalShipping.a: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping costs and times vary depending on the destination.

cancelOrder.q: How can I cancel an order?
cancelOrder.a: Orders cannot be canceled once they are completed. However, the user can contact customer support for assistance.

damagedItem.q: What if I receive a damaged item?
damagedItem.a: We are sorry to hear that! Please contact us within one hour of receiving the order with photos of the damaged product. We will send you a replacement or issue a full refund immediately.

SupportFAQ.noResults: No results found. Try a different search term or contact support.
